remarks: A function with a domain of three elements.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Oct-2014.)  (Proof shortened by Alexander van der Vekens, 23-Jan-2018.)
statement:
ftp.a $e |- A e. _V $.
ftp.b $e |- B e. _V $.
ftp.c $e |- C e. _V $.
ftp.d $e |- X e. _V $.
ftp.e $e |- Y e. _V $.
ftp.f $e |- Z e. _V $.
ftp.g $e |- A =/= B $.
ftp.h $e |- A =/= C $.
ftp.i $e |- B =/= C $.
ftp $p |- { <. A , X >. , <. B , Y >. , <. C , Z >. } : { A , B , C } --> { X , Y , Z } $.
